title: How to Monitor Data Drift in Production

sections.heading: Overview
sections.content: Data drift detection is crucial for maintaining model performance in production environments. Evidently provides comprehensive tools to monitor data drift over time.

sections.heading: Using Evidently's Drift Detector
sections.content: Evidently's DataDriftProfile allows you to detect statistical changes in feature distributions. You can set thresholds and get automated alerts when drift exceeds your defined limits.

sections.heading: Production Integration
sections.content: For production deployments, use Evidently's monitoring dashboard to track drift metrics in real-time. The library integrates with popular frameworks and provides webhook support for alerting systems.
